titles.title: TSA Acquisition Reform Act of 2007
A bill to apply basic contracting laws to the Transportation Security Administration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10613-10614)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
8/1/2007--Introduced.
TSA Acquisition Reform Act of 2007 - Repeals provisions exempting the Transportation Security Administration from specified federal procurement requirements.
